ocy2 = OCyara('tests/')
ocy2.run('tests/example.yara', save_context=True)
jcb_matches = ocy2.list_matches('JCB')
assert jcb_matches['JCB'] == {('tests/Example.pdf',
    """Testing1234
0001273456

"""
    )}
